## StageParams interface

A parameter builder interface describing the stage of the suggestion whether is it being edited or newly created.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StageParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [stage](./prosemirror-suggest.stageparams.stage.md) | <code>SuggestStage</code> | The current stage of the focused mention. Can be used to decide which action to use. |
